Assertion for mlr3 objects

Source: R/helper_asserts.R

Functions intended to be used in packages extending mlr3.

assert_backend(b)

assert_experiment(e)

assert_task(task)

assert_learner(learner, task = NULL)

assert_measure(measure, task = NULL, learner = NULL)

assert_measures(measures, task = NULL, learner = NULL)

assert_resampling(resampling)

assert_resample_result(resample_result)

assert_param_set(param_set)

assert_param_vals(param_vals, param_set)

Arguments

b

[[DataBackend]].
e

[[Experiment]].
task

[[Task]].
learner

[[Learner]].
measure

[[Measure]].
measures

[list of [Measure]].
resampling

[[Resampling]].
resample_result

[[ResampleResult]].
param_set

[paradox::ParamSet()].
param_vals

[named list].
